mapper.select: SELECT p.*, h.symptom_detail FROM bit_care.patient as p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM history as a WHERE a.id = ( SELECT id FROM history as b WHERE b.patient_id = a.patient_id ORDER BY b.id desc LIMIT 1) ) AS h ON p.id = h.patient_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT distinct patient.id FROM patient LEFT JOIN history ON patient.id = history.patient_id LEFT JOIN history_disease ON history.id = history_disease.history_id where history_disease.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or patient.id like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or patient.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or patient.identity_number like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or patient.phone_number like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) as p2 ON p.id = p2.id LIMIT #{offset}, #{recordSize}

SELECT count(distinct p.id) FROM bit_care.patient as p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM history as a WHERE a.id = ( SELECT id FROM history as b WHERE b.patient_id = a.patient_id ORDER BY b.id desc LIMIT 1) ) AS h ON p.id = h.patient_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT distinct patient.id FROM patient LEFT JOIN history ON patient.id = history.patient_id LEFT JOIN history_disease ON history.id = history_disease.history_id where history_disease.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or patient.id like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or patient.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or patient.identity_number like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or patient.phone_number like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) as p2 ON p.id = p2.id;
